item.title: Vietnamese singer Duc Phuc wins Russia's Intervision song contest
item.description: Vietnam was among 23 countries competing in a glitzy Russian song contest, revived three years after Russia was banned from Eurovision.

item.title: Morrissey cancels US shows after death threat in Canada
item.description: A 26-year-old Ottawa man has been charged with allegedly uttering a threat against the British singer.

item.title: The British Army cannot keep ignoring the murder of our friend in Kenya
item.description: Friends of the stabbed 21-year-old Kenyan woman recount to the BBC events on the night she went missing.

item.title: Day of delays at Heathrow after cyber-attack brings disruption
item.description: The issue affecting check-in and baggage systems has also caused cancellations in Brussels and Berlin.

item.title: I took a job on a whim on New Year's Eve - and ended up stranded at sea for six months
item.description: What would you do if you were stuck on a ship, far from loved ones, and you had no idea how - or when - youâ€™d get home?
